header.subtitle: Driving technical innovation and team efficiency through Serverless architectures, Full Stack development, and Agile methodologies.

cloud.title: Cloud Native & Serverless
cloud.desc: AWS & GCP, Lambda, DynamoDB, and other serverless services.

principles.title: More than just code.
principles.description: I believe technology should empower people, not complicate their lives. My philosophy is rooted in Clean Code, User Centricity, and continuous learning. When I’m not debugging distributed systems, I’m contributing to open source or writing technical articles to help the next generation of developers.

frontend.title: Frontend Mastery
frontend.desc: React, Vue, TailwindCSS, Astro, TypeScript, WebGL

aptitudes.title: Skills
aptitudes.description: Full Stack developer with a passion for creating code. Experienced in cloud computing and dedicated to building software that delivers a great user experience. Enjoys programming while listening to music.

experiences.title: Experience
experiences.subtitle: Consulting roles focused on delivery, cloud, and scalable systems.
experiences.tw:
• Digital Ecosystem Modernization & Event-Driven Architecture Acting as a technical consultant driving the evolution of critical platforms for enterprise clients. 
• Scalable Architecture: Designing and implementing robust microservices with NestJS and event-driven architectures using Kafka for large-scale data processing. 
 • System Integration: Delivering Full Stack solutions (ReactJS) integrated with complex e-commerce platforms (VTEX), optimizing the user transactional experience. 
 • DevOps Leadership: Standardizing CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions and Semantic Versioning, reducing time-to-market and ensuring reliable deployments across multiple environments.
experiences.option:
• High-Availability Solutions for the Mining Industry Developing industrial software focused on the visualization and management of critical assets. 
• Data Visualization: Building high-performance ReactJS dashboards for real-time monitoring of mining operations. 
• Cloud Infrastructure: Orchestrating RESTful APIs in Python (Flask), containerized with Docker and deployed on AWS Fargate, ensuring high availability and fault tolerance.
experiences.arkho:
• Serverless Data Engineering: Designing and automating ETL workflows using AWS Glue and Athena, transforming raw data into actionable business intelligence.
 • Automation & Operational Efficiency: Implementing AWS Lambda-based solutions and intelligent chatbots, eliminating manual processes and significantly reducing operational overhead.
experiences.karibu: • End-to-End Agile Development: Delivering modern web applications from scratch using Nuxt.js (Vue) and Node.js, while managing infrastructure and deployment on Google Cloud Platform (GCP).
experiences.early_career:
• Full Stack Evolution: Initial career path focused on mastering web architectures, transitioning from PHP/Laravel development to modern JavaScript ecosystems like Node.js and Vue.js.
 • Specialized Project Delivery: Successfully implemented diverse solutions, including 3D visualizations with ThreeJS for industrial environments and complex e-commerce payment integrations.
 • Professional Growth: Built a strong foundation in software engineering, SQL databases, and agile principles that paved the way for my transition into Senior and Cloud-focused roles.

interests.title: Interests
interests.description: Staying active is important to me, and I enjoy activities like Crossfit and hiking to help me stay energized. Photography is one of my passions and I love capturing special moments and beautiful landscapes. I have a diverse taste in music and enjoy attending concerts to enjoy music.

feature_project.title: Featured Project
feature_project.description: A comprehensive platform engineered to optimize Olympic weightlifting performance. Built with a 100% Serverless architecture on AWS, ensuring instant scalability and cost-efficiency. This project showcases advanced Infrastructure as Code (CDK) practices and a high-performance reactive UI focused on the athlete's user experience.
